q: what happened after the man explained
pred: After the man explained the process of trimming the bushes, he began to trim the bushes in the yard. He used a pair of scissors to trim the bushes and also used a leaf blower to clear the leaves from the yard. He then used a hedge trimmer to trim the bushes and a broom to sweep the leaves from the yard. He also used a rake to rake the leaves from the yard. Finally, he used a blower to blow the leaves from the yard.
